name.description: The name of the type. This is a descriptive name that is used in the user interface.

description.description: A description of the type. This describes the high-level purpose of the type in one or two sentences.

name.description: The name of the attribute. This is a descriptive name that is used in the user interface.

type.description: The type of the attribute. This is the data type of the attribute.

description.description: A description of the attribute. This describes the high-level purpose of the attribute in one or two sentences.
